captions.text: Hi, how are you going? My name is Sucker.
And the elections are coming!

Soon I can exercise my citizenship
using the most modern,

efficient, responsive, transparent and 
secure voting system in the world...
The Brazilian electronic ballot boxes!
And what was already good, will get even better!

For now, with the new biometric identification system,
any chance of fraud in elections is eliminated!
Wooooow that's cooool!
The voting in Brazil is NOT printed!
And the only thing that voters can make...

It is believe that what he typed on the screen, it really was
computed by the machine and that won't be changed!

Oh, and also have to hope that their vote remains
secret and no one finds out who he voted!
In these electronic ballot boxes, it is NOT possible to perform a audit by the recount.

That is, even the politicians don't have any
security for the counting of received votes!

Or you believe in conference
by the machine itself or screw you!
Ah, but the TSE said that the electronic ballot boxes are 100% safe!

An electoral system can not be based
simply trusting in the authority.
If you believe in something just because someone told you,

Then unplug this video and start making
a short letter to Santa, go!
No serious country in the world uses the model of Brazilian polls.

Incidentally, it was rejected by more than 60 countries,
who regarded even unconstitutional!
Even the king of forgery, Paraguay, refused to use them!

In an urn where the voter doesn't know
if their vote was actually recorded...

And the poll worker is not known whether this vote
was actually added, couldn't be different!

Only in Brazil itself, the "smart way" country, football, carnival,
fraud, embezzlement and corruption, to accept such a thing!

Even so, the government and the TSE insist on announcing
the myth that the Brazilian ballot box 1st generation...

Is modern, safe and genuine
reference to the world...
And the printing of votes would be a setback!

But several countries are already using systems 2nd or 3rd generation
that are much more advanced and reliable... and they all print the votes.

In Argentina, the ballot boxes of 3rd generation
print the vote, and their ballots have chip,

What ensures transparency, security and
agility in the vote count.
Furthermore, they are touch-screen,

which besides being more friendly to the voter,
Can be reused for other purposes such as plebiscites,
without the need for any workaround!
Stop fucking me!
If the TSE actually seek security
would have long ago released for consultation PUBLIC
the source code of the voting system in Brazil.

Allowing unrestricted, which colleges
and universities could improve these codes
Or urn itself, making them safer.

But they prefer to hide this information
and pay fortunes for consulting firms...

Whose security strategy is simply "overshadow" or
at maximum hide the door key under the mat.

Would this be naivete, lack of resources,
incompetence, stupidity or even slutty?!

A truly secure system should be
inviolable even to his own creator.

Therefore, it makes no sense to try
hide probable and possible errors in their code.
Want more?!

Large technology companies and financial
institutions spend billions a year on research

and safety of their products.
And yet, fail to create systems
100% secure or proof of fraud or hackers!

Do you really think the TSE or the Brazilian agency
information [ABIN]
That would be equivalent to a tupiniquim C.I.A...

Who only discovered that Dilma was been spied,
through news on TV,

Could they create systems 100% safe or
proof of fraud?!
Woool!
You're shitting me, right?!
Teams of Brazilian universities,

within a few hours of analyzing more than 10 million
of lines of code of the polls...

And in a completely controlled ambient
and guarded by the TSE...
Found infant safety flaws!
And fund ways to identify the popular vote.
So even the most basic principle of the vote,
What is the guarantee of secrecy or secret ballot isn't fulfilled!

Not to mention the allegations of vote ghosts,
poll workers fraud, halter voting,

sale of securities of deceased voters,
exchange results and so on.
The polls are only safe for Brazilian fraudsters,

What may be even infiltrated the
Electoral Justice itself.
Was spent a fortune with the biometric registration of voters,

under the supost allegation that this would prevent
vote ghosts, or other types of fraud.

But even with biometrics, one board member
could defraud the urn...
Inserting votes of absentee voters manually,

Simply claiming error in biometric identification,
or false negative.
In practice, the biometric identification

is solely for sharing data
from the Federal Police and F.B.I.
Besides feeding the most creative conspiracy theories!

Did you knew that the TSE takes a picture in high definition
the biometric voter registration renewal?

But not accept as proof of identification
the voter that himself provides?!

And this is simply because the title
DO NOT HAVE A PHOTO OF VOTER!!
So why take the FUCKING photo?

Anyway, the Brazilian electronic ballot boxes are reasons
of joke in the world and a disgrace to this country!
But one thing the TSE is good...
They managed to make the Brazilians believed

that the GARBAGE voting system of the
country is really modern and safe...
But until that feat wasn't that hard...

After all, Brazil is the only country where the
same body that oversees elections,
also controls, creates and judge the laws themselves.

Moreover, will they try to censor
this video or sue me?

What they usually do when someone
tries to face them!

Or go take the shame and resolve
the mentioned problems?!

Help promote this idea! Share this
video on your social networks.

The vote is the simplest and most peaceful way
for us to change something in this country...

But if neither the electronic voting poll
in Brazil is reliable, we're screwed!

And don't forget to check the links in the description
video and access the Canal do Otário's website:
www.canaldootario.com.br
Oops, it fell! It was an accident! I swear it was an accident!

If you like the Canal do Otário and
wants to help keep you financially,
Make a donation!

Or purchase products Canal do Otário.
The links are in the video description.

If only 10% of those enrolled in the 
channel donate only 10 dollars once,

This would be enough to maintain a staff with
a minimum of resources for more than one year!

Unfortunately, do all the work by myself,
isn't being  possible anymore more!
Otário A. Anonymous - @CanalDoOtario
